ai-tha-ap191:1.2_0: a great flood, then was made,
ai-tha-ap191:1.3_0: And the Buddha is extinguished in this world,
ai-tha-ap191:2.1_0: In order to recall having understood
ai-tha-ap191:2.2_0: The limbs of the eightfold path
ai-tha-ap191:3.1_0: I took ahold of the Vedas,
ai-tha-ap191:3.3_0: At the time of the Buddha became fully extinguished.
ai-tha-ap191:4.1_0: may all gods rejoice in the heavens.
ai-tha-ap191:4.4_0: Would I have a bad destination?
ai-tha-ap191:5.1_0: I stood at one hundred thousand times.
ai-tha-ap191:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Sāriputta.
ai-tha-ap191:8.1_0: nine Elder monks were Community of nuns.
